definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
to register one's name/account name (on a computer)

sentences.english: She clicks on the link to the registration form and begins entering her information.
sentences.chinese: 她在登記表的連接處點擊一下，開始進入她的信息。

sentences.english: This initiative helped improve registration of births and deaths at the subdistrict level.
sentences.chinese: 這一舉措幫助改善了街道一級的出生和死亡登記。

sentences.english: An enterprise as a legal person shall conduct operations within the range approved and registered.
sentences.chinese: 企業法人應當在覈准登記的經營範圍內從事經營。

sentences.english: Attendance will be recorded on the Training attendance register.
sentences.chinese: 出勤情況將記錄在培訓出勤登記薄上。

sentences.english: registration with the people's armed forces departments at the county level.
sentences.chinese: 縣人民武裝部辦理預備役軍官登記。

sentences.english: You need to fill out registration card.
Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 請問閣下是否有興趣優先登記以下展覽會？

sentences.english: Marriage without registration is not recognized by law.
sentences.chinese: 法律不承認未登記的婚姻。

sentences.english: Yes, Passport and the disembarkation card, please.
sentences.chinese: 是的，請給我護照，以及旅客入境登記表。

sentences.english: Cardholders will be given a reference number upon successful registration of the Coupon Promotion.
sentences.chinese: 成功登記之客戶於完成登記時將獲發一個參考編號。

sentences.english: A polling station is where I vote and is listed on my Elector Information Card.
sentences.chinese: 投票站是我前往投票的地方，在選民登記列明地點。

sentences.english: Would you fill out the registration form, please?
sentences.chinese: 請您填一下住宿登記表號嗎？

sentences.english: I can't go down to the registrar and say, you know, I'd really like to do it at another time.
sentences.chinese: 我不能去和登記的人說，我想要換個時間。

sentences.english: They checked to see if she enrolled among the voters of their district.
sentences.chinese: 他們複覈看看她是否被登記在他們區的選民名單中。

sentences.english: No shares of stock against which the corporation holds unpaid claim shall be transferable in the books of the corporation.
sentences.chinese: 購股款未付清的股份不得在公司登記冊中過戶。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
